Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! What are you doing?! I'm trying to
repair that frame! Don't touch it!

Or do you wanna be made into parts?
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! Can you stop looming? I can't focus
if you just stand there all silently!

Can't you see the Depths team left me an
armored vehicle to fix?!
Talk_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, that certainly is <clr:0000>500 rupees<clr:ffff> there.<sp:5:1:0>
Heh,<sp:5:0:0> this marks the beginning of a very
rewarding friendship.
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Let me know what needs tuning, and we'll make the
Gloomdredger more monstrous than ever!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Then get lost! Waste my time with
chitchat again, and I'll be using YOU
as vehicle parts!
Talk_05_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal><sp:0:2:2:5000>If you really won't take no for an answer, I could
sell you one for <clr:0000>999 rupees<clr:ffff>...

Huh...<sp:5:1:0> You're a blademaster, aren't you? For you,
I'll let it go for a much cheaper <clr:0000>500 rupees<clr:ffff>.

Just as long as you tell me your thoughts on how
to improve this vicious vehicle.

Oh, and don't tell anybody you got it from me.
It'd be bad for me if this got out.

You OK if we do the handover outside?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmph, the way they treat my creations...
Just because I can fix it doesn't mean
they can smash it to bits!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What's your problem?! I'm busy!


Or are you interested my ripsnorting
ripper, after all? My mad machine?
My masterpiece, the Gloomdredger?!
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Then get lost! Waste my time again and
I'll mount you to the front of one of these!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Next I'll just mount this tire here... And
fix it real tight so it won't come off...
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Then get outta here with your small talk!
Waste my time again and I'll use ya as a
tire tread!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Then beat it! Waste my time with small
talk again and I'll tie your head to the
lights and shine 'em right in your eyes!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Huh? You're interested in this raging
roadster? My fiendish, armor-clad
masterwork?! The Gloomdredger?!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! Cut it out! I told you that frame's in
the middle of being repaired!

Do you want me to repair the inside of
your head too?!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What's with you? Oh, no, no, no...
Don't tell me...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0900>You smashed up my Gloomdredger, didn't
you?! My poor little fiendish, armored
monster machine!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, that certainly is <clr:0000>999 rupees<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
Heh,<sp:5:0:0> this marks the beginning of a
very rewarding friendship.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're back again. My snarling, skewering
Gloomdredger really is impossible to get
out of your head, isn't it?
Talk_04:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700>The product in question is outside... Follow me.
This way.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal><sp:0:2:2:5000>If you really won't take no for an answer, I could
sell you one for <clr:0000>999 rupees<clr:ffff>...

But if word gets around that I sold one to some
random Yiga member, it'll be "so long, reputation"
for me.
OK if we do the handover outside?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_18: <sp:3:0:2:0700>There it is, tires and all. Take it.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Why you! You don't have enough money!
Are you mocking me? I'll run you over!<sp:0:4:0>I don't rub elbows with losers. Forget we
ever talked, and get outta here!
